Hero.title: Real-World Mining Meets Web3
Hero.description: Invest in real, verified mineral assets through blockchain.

about.title: What Is IMD Token?
about.description: MineToken is a blockchain-based digital asset backed by real-world mineral reserves. We bridge the gap between traditional mining and decentralized finance — making resource investing easy, secure, and accessible to everyone.

globalAccess.title: Global access
globalAccess.description: Investment in the mining industry for everyone around the world without restrictions

fullTransparency.title: Full transparency
fullTransparency.description: All transactions and assets are traceable on the blockchain.

realSupport.title: Real support
realSupport.description: Each token is backed by real mining assets.

projects.title: Assets backing the token
projects.description: A list of mining projects, reserves, or contracts that are presented as the real backing for the token.

buyTokens.question: How can I buy tokens?
buyTokens.answer: Through reputable online exchanges or directly from the official MID Token website with a digital wallet connection. Step-by-step purchasing instructions are also available on the site.

tokenValue.question: How is the token's value maintained?
tokenValue.answer: The token's value is maintained through real mineral asset backing, market demand, and transparent blockchain technology that ensures trust and stability.

tokenValue2.answer: The token's value is maintained through real mineral asset backing, market demand, and transparent blockchain technology that ensures trust and stability.

notFound.title: Oops! Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for seems to have wandered off into the digital mining tunnels. Don't worry, we'll help you find your way back to the surface!

suggestions.title: Here's what you can try
suggestions.checkUrl: Check if the URL is spelled correctly
suggestions.useNavigation: Use the navigation menu to find what you need
suggestions.searchBelow: Try the actions below to get back on track

notFound.help: Still having trouble? Contact our support team for assistance.

footer.title: IMD Token
footer.subtitle: The Future of Investing in the Mining Industry with Blockchain
footer.description: The first digital token backed by real, mined assets. A bridge between the physical and digital worlds.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.name: Name
contact.successMessage: Your message has been received. We will get back to you soon.

tokenizationRequest.title: Token Listing Request
tokenizationRequest.subtitle: Submit your project for tokenization and listing on our platform
tokenizationRequest.documentsHelp: Please include: Business license, project documentation, financial statements, technical reports
tokenizationRequest.successMessage: Your token listing request has been received. Our team will review your submission and contact you within 5-7 business days.

market.title: Secondary Market and Liquidity
market.subtitle: Trade tokens in the secondary market and P2P
market.description: The project token can be traded in the secondary market and P2P (peer-to-peer). Liquidity is always available through market makers to ensure easy buying and selling.

features.title: Features
features.stableLiquidity: Stable liquidity to reduce price volatility
features.accessExchanges: Access to domestic and DEX exchanges
